pages.text: The Walkie-Talkie is a tool that allows people to communicate using voice through a Minecraft server.$(p)$(bold)Hold $(k:sneak)$() and $(bold)press $(k:use)$() to $(bold)toggle on/off$()$(br)$(bold)Press $(k:key.mekanism.mode)$() to $(bold)change channels$() (1-8)$(br)$(bold)Hold $(k:key.mekanismadditions.voice)$() to $(bold)speak$() through the Walkie-Talkie
